command: -DEMSCRIPTEN=1 -D__EMSCRIPTEN__=1 -pedantic -x c++ bin/intermediate -I imgui-docking/ -g -include EmscriptenPlatform.h -x c++-header -DNO_FREETYPE -DDEBUG -D_DEBUG -D_DEBUG_ -O0 -std=c++20 -o bin/Intermediate/Debug/%(Filename).o -o ${workspaceFolder}/bin/Resonate.html --bind -O0 --js-library emsdk-main/upstream/emscripten/src/library_webgpu.js --shell-file ${workspaceFolder}/.vscode/imgui_shell.html -g3
